response.original_title: Up In The Clouds The Movie(Reloaded)
response.overview: Meet Javon Thompson, the number 1 club photographer in Atlanta. Watch what happens when Javon throws the biggest afterparty in Birthday Bash history. The only problem is that he doesn't remember what happened. Drugged, Robbed, and on the Run! Can he do it all over again? Oh and I forgot to mention that the can't find his car or the cash. Come see why Javon got kicked out of his own party? Based on a true story, where we are held accountable for each others Mental Health. What happens when life gives you everything you want and more! @UpInTheCloudsTheMoive
response.title: Up In The Clouds The Movie(Reloaded)
